EmailTemplate.name: TSE-2017-10-12-Vancouver Community Appreciation Event.ES-2017-10-03-Vancouver.EM
EmailTemplate.subject: You're Invited: Turbonomic Community Appreciation Canucks vs Jets
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://turbonomic.com/vancouver-community/]]> Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
We are pleased to invite you to an exclusive event on October 12th, as the Vancouver Canucks take on the Winnepeg Jets. We're expecting a fantastic evening filled with food, drinks, and of course, hockey. We hope you will accept this invitation to join us, learn more about Turbonomic, Cisco, and network with your peers in the technology industry. Vancouver Canucks vs Winnepeg Jets <[[https://turbonomic.com/vancouver-community/]]>
Where: Rogers Arena 800 Griffiths Way, Vancouver, BC Thursday, October 12th 7:00pm <[[https://turbonomic.com/vancouver-community/]]>
We hope to see you there,
- The Turbonomic Team
